alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:10PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sublette, northwestern Lincoln and south central Teton Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 310 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alpine, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hoback around 325 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bondurant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
